book.synopsis: Bobby Jobe is a pro golfer whose swing is better than his attitude. When he bogies the last four holes and blows his lead in a major tournament -- again -- he berates his caddy, Henry
book.title_long: A Mulligan for Bobby Jobe: A Novel
